title: Textile, "Turbo", 2010
medium:
Medium: 100% poly-silk warp and 100% acetate ribbon weft
Technique: woven
creditline: Gift of Hechizoo and Cristina Grajales Gallery, New York
description: Two panels, one dark brown and one violet, with a psychedelic weft-float weave. The pattern is based on costumes that Indians wear when they practice religious rituals and drink a hallucinogenic herb, Yagé.  According to tradition, this helps them see and remember their ancestors

tombstone.epitaph:

2010. Medium: 100% poly-silk warp and 100% acetate ribbon weft
